cast.name: 马修·雷·鲁格斯 Matthew Ray Ruggles

introduction: 此片为导演Jennifer Schwerin为 "NATIONAL FILM CHALLENGE 2012" 创作的参赛作品, 从剧本,拍摄,到后期,全部于限定的72小时内完成. 此短片荣获"最佳导演", "最佳摄影",“最佳女主角”和 "最佳流派应用" 四项大奖, 并成为超过一百六十部参赛作品里的前十五名大奖候选作品之一.This film is made for the NATIONAL FILM CHALLENGE 2012 by award-winning director Jennifer Schwerin. From scriptwriting, shooting to post production, the project is completed within 72 hours and is the proud winner of BEST DIRECTING, BEST CINEMATOGRAPHY, BEST ACTING IN FEMALE LEAD and BEST USE OF GENRE IN FILM DE FEMME, after becoming one the 15 finalists among 120 competing films
